verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Bildad <S%H1085><s%> the Shuhite, <S%H7747><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
How <S%H5704><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> will it be ere you make <S%H7760><s%> an end <S%H7078><s%> of words? <S%H4405><s%> mark, <S%H995><s%> and afterwards <S%H310><s%> we will speak. <S%H1696><s%>
Why <S%H4069><s%> are we counted <S%H2803><s%> as beasts, <S%H929><s%> and reputed vile <S%H2933><s%> in your sight? <S%H5869><s%>

He tears <S%H2963><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> in his anger: <S%H639><s%> shall the earth <S%H776><s%> be forsaken <S%H5800><s%> for you? and shall the rock <S%H6697><s%> be removed <S%H6275><s%> out of his place? <S%H4725><s%>
Yes, <S%H1571><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be put <S%H1846><s%> out, and the spark <S%H7632><s%> of his fire <S%H784><s%> shall not shine. <S%H5050><s%>
The light <S%H216><s%> shall be dark <S%H2821><s%> in his tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> and his candle <S%H5216><s%> shall be put <S%H1846><s%> out with him.
The steps <S%H6806><s%> of his strength <S%H202><s%> shall be straitened, <S%H3334><s%> and his own counsel <S%H6098><s%> shall cast <S%H7993><s%> him down.
For he is cast <S%H7971><s%> into a net <S%H7568><s%> by his own feet, <S%H7272><s%> and he walks <S%H1980><s%> on a snare. <S%H7639><s%>
The gin <S%H6341><s%> shall take <S%H270><s%> him by the heel, <S%H6119><s%> and the robber <S%H6782><s%> shall prevail <S%H2388><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him.
The snare <S%H2256><s%> is laid for him in the ground, <S%H776><s%> and a trap <S%H4434><s%> for him in the way. <S%H5410><s%>
Terrors <S%H1091><s%> shall make him afraid <S%H1204><s%> on every <S%H5437><s%> side, <S%H5439><s%> and shall drive <S%H6327><s%> him to his feet. <S%H7272><s%>
His strength <S%H202><s%> shall be extremely hungry, <S%H7457><s%> and destruction <S%H343><s%> shall be ready <S%H3559><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> his side. <S%H6763><s%>
It shall devour <S%H398><s%> the strength <S%H905><s%> of his skin: <S%H5785><s%> even the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> his strength. <S%H905><s%>
His confidence <S%H4009><s%> shall be rooted <S%H5423><s%> out of his tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> and it shall bring <S%H6805><s%> him to the king <S%H4428><s%> of terrors. <S%H1091><s%>
It shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in his tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> because it is none <S%H1097><s%> of his: brimstone <S%H1614><s%> shall be scattered <S%H2219><s%> on his habitation. <S%H5116><s%>
His roots <S%H8328><s%> shall be dried <S%H3001><s%> up beneath, <S%H8478><s%> and above <S%H4605><s%> shall his branch <S%H7105><s%> be cut <S%H5243><s%> off.
His remembrance <S%H2143><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> and he shall have no <S%H3808><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> in the street. <S%H2351><s%> <S%H6440><s%>
He shall be driven <S%H1920><s%> from light <S%H216><s%> into darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and chased <S%H5074><s%> out of the world. <S%H8398><s%>

He shall neither <S%H3808><s%> have son <S%H5209><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> nephew <S%H5220><s%> among his people, <S%H5971><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> any remaining <S%H8300><s%> in his dwellings. <S%H4033><s%>

They that come after <S%H314><s%> him shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> his day, <S%H3117><s%> as they that went <S%H6923><s%> before <S%H6931><s%> were affrighted. <S%H270><s%> <S%H8178><s%>

Surely <S%H389><s%> such <S%H428><s%> are the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of the wicked, <S%H5767><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is the place <S%H4725><s%> of him that knows <S%H3045><s%> not God. <S%H410><s%>
